What is the carbon sequestration potential of increased wood harvest ?
=======================
# 
This application is an addition to the publication [Valade et al., 2023](https://) and displays in an interactive manner the database and meta-analysis presented in the study.

This app can be used to
* Explore the database used for the meta-analysis.
* Visualize the results of the meta-analysis.
* Generate new results with subsets of data.
